thread.title: 26 Watercolor Wedding Cakes That Will Take Your Breath Away - Watercolor Cake Is the Dreamiest New Wedding Trend
thread.title_full: 26 Watercolor Wedding Cakes That Will Take Your Breath Away - Watercolor Cake Is the Dreamiest New Wedding Trend

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: 26 Watercolor Wedding Cakes That Will Take Your Breath Away - Watercolor Cake Is the Dreamiest New Wedding Trend
text:
1 Lovely Lavender Thank you, @theknot for featuring this loverly lavender lass yesterday. Luckily @amorology is always giving me insane inspiration and then letting do mah thang üòò üì∏: @lunademarephoto #waferpaper
A post shared by s t e v i a u b l e (@heytherecupcake_) on Feb 2, 2017 at 12:29pm PST
This feminine, floral cake by Hey There, Cupcake! features stunningly soft strokes of lavender and pink.
2 Whimsical Wedding Cake A post shared by Maggie Austin (@maggieaustincake) on Mar 7, 2016 at 6:14am PST
How exquisite is Maggie Austin 's three-tiered confection wrapped with hand-painted strips of fondant?
3 Romantic Watercolor Here's a close up of this buttercream beauty... Handpainted buttercream and fresh flowers üòç #melissasfinepastries #nola #weddingcakes #weddingcakeinspiration #bestcakesneworleans #neworleanswedding #neworleanscake #nolacake #nolawedding #luxurywedding #weddinginspiration #yummy #pretty
A post shared by Melissa's Fine Pastries (@melissasfinepastries) on Mar 20, 2016 at 5:11pm PDT
Melissa's Fine Pastries hand-painted this fit-for-a-fairy-tale buttercream-frosted confection with the most romantic muted shades of gold, blue, and violet and topped it off with fresh flowers.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 4 Bold Bursts of Color These vibrant ladies sat proudly at the #cavinelizabethvendorbash last night among so much beauty created by so many wonderful vendors. @cavinelizabeth @weedsandwhimsy @samanthalouisedesigns @continentalcatering @sdcakepopshop @blueladderbotany @luxeeventssd @notmydish #waferpaper
A post shared by s t e v i a u b l e (@heytherecupcake_) on Feb 1, 2017 at 12:44pm PST
There's no rule that says watercolor wedding cakes can only come in pastel hues. We love this bolder, brighter take on the trend by Hey There, Cupcake!
5 Neutral Watercolor @bluegardeniaevents coined the phrase well when she named this design #slightlyclothed. Somewhere between semi nude and neutrally textured. Well we love it! @catherineguidry @poppyandmint #seminudecake #texturedbuttercreamcake #neutralweddingcake #contemporaryweddingcake #freshflowers #buttercreamweddingcake #nolaweddings #neworlwansweddings #bestcakesneworleans
A post shared by Melissa's Fine Pastries (@melissasfinepastries) on Jan 12, 2017 at 5:03pm PST
On the other hand, neutral strokes are just as striking, as proven by this textured, cloud-like white wedding cake by Melissa's Fine Pastries .
6 Hand-painted Thistles A sneak peek at my newest #handpaintedcake with #gilded blue #thistles - see it for yourself tomorrow @bespoke_sf with @chantalevents !
A post shared by Sainte G. Cake Company (@sainte.g) on Mar 14, 2016 at 1:54pm PDT
Sainte G. Cake Company 's delicate blue watercolor thistles with touches of gold look too artful to eat (almost).
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 7 Watercolor In Action We are artists; our medium is sugar. @paigey1375 #cakeartistry #howwedoit #paintingonfondant #cakeart #cakesofinstagram #fineartcakestudio #prettycakes #handpainting #paintpalette #bestcakesneworleans #cakeartist #theknot #thatlacommunity
A post shared by Melissa's Fine Pastries (@melissasfinepastries) on Nov 13, 2016 at 7:24am PST
This caption from Melissa's Fine Pastries says it all: "We are artists; our medium is sugar."
8 Black and White Ombre This cake of ours has been getting a lot of love this past week! Thanks for sharing our creation @weddingchicks! Watercolor, geometric inspired wedding cake for our lovely bride Addison for her wedding at @thedallasarboretum Photo by @sarahdelanie
A post shared by Sugar Bee Sweets (@sugarbeesweets) on Jan 25, 2016 at 12:57pm PST
An ombre watercolor technique takes this modern, geometric wedding cake by Sugar Bee Sweets from black to gray to white.
9 Put a Bird on It A post shared by Cake Ink. (@cake_ink) on Aug 27, 2015 at 10:25pm PDT
Can we frame this Cake Ink confection?
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 10 Warm Watercolor Tones This lovely favorite of mine is featured on @greenweddingshoes today! Be sure to check it out and look at the beautiful @minted invitation, designed by @melanieseverin that was the inspiration!photography by @kbrodge ‚Ä¢ flowers by @lizzymcginn #weddingcake #wedding #watercolor
A post shared by Cathy Haebe (@kneadtomake) on Sep 30, 2015 at 12:10pm PDT
Warm tones of pink and orange adorn this otherwise simple wedding cake by Knead to Make .
11 Natural Watercolor Wedding Cake Nature is one of my favorite things! Creating this cake was from the heart. @inspired.event designed the beautiful table and @sheradeehurstphotography captured this stunning shot. #normanbakery #customcakes #sugarartist #bridesofok
A post shared by Amy Cullifer (@amycakes7) on Jan 26, 2017 at 7:18pm PST
We love it when bakers take inspiration from the great outdoors, like in this Amy Cakes masterpiece.
12 Spring Watercolor Wedding Cake Still in love with this spring time cherry blossom shoot with such an amazing team!! üíûüòçüëå #weddinginspiration #cakespiration #styledshoot #styledbridalshoot cakelove #weddinginspiration #cakeideas #cakeinspiration #cakesofig #cakestagram #cakecentral #thecakeblog #huffpostweddings #dailyhivevan #weddingcake #theknotcakes #bridebookcakes #weddingphotography #weddingcake #weddingcakes #CakeAndGiraffe #customcake #customweddingcake #cakedesign #cakedesigner #cakelove #handpainted #paintedflowers #cakegasm #instacake #sugarflowers #sugarroses #springwedding
A post shared by Dalana (@cakeandgiraffe) on Jul 13, 2016 at 5:32pm PDT
White panels on this blue wedding cake by The Cake & The Giraffe provide the perfect canvas for watercolor flowers that echo the spirit of the spring season.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 13 Watercolor Base @Regrann from @greenweddingshoes - How dreamy is this watercolor #wedding #cake by @sainte.g üíôüò±üíô Major love for this one...see more from this lovely winter editorial #onGWS {direct link in profile} // photos by @maria.lamb and styling by @_emilyriggsbridal #watercolorweddingcake #weddingcake #winterwedding #Regrann
A post shared by Chelsea Shoesmith Photography (@chelseashoesmithphotos) on Feb 19, 2016 at 6:42pm PST
This beautiful blue and silver sweet by Sainte G. Cake Company was made for a winter wedding .
14 Moody Wedding Cake Moody, brooding, romantic.
A post shared by Maggie Austin (@maggieaustincake) on Jun 25, 2015 at 9:28am PDT
Artistic brides and grooms would fall head over heels for this romantic cake by Maggie Austin , which looks like it belongs in a museum.
15 Gilded Watercolor Cake One of our absolute favorite creations! It is a fondant-covered, hand-painted, sugar flower adorned, watercolor cake. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ú® PC: @catherineguidry @ilmercatonola @sapphireevents #melissasfinepastries #catherineguidryphotography #ilmercato #watercolor #handpainted #weddingcakes #nolaweddings #neworleansweddings #nolacakes #bestcakesneworleans #bestcakes #cakedesigner #sugarart #instagood #cakeart #cakelove
A post shared by Melissa's Fine Pastries (@melissasfinepastries) on Feb 1, 2016 at 6:22pm PST
Flecks of gold elevate this pretty pink watercolor design by Melissa's Fine Pastries .
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 16 Dripping in Gold üíïüíó which one is your favorite?
A post shared by Sweet Cheeks Baking Co. (@sweetcheeksbakingco) on Apr 6, 2016 at 10:53pm PDT
The front cake of this tantalizing trio looks as if it's dripping in gold thanks to the expert strokes by Sweet Cheeks Baking Company.
17 Secret Garden This lovely cake made the list for Brides.com 50 most beautiful wedding cakes today! Many thanks again to @kylieswanson and @brettheidebrecht
A post shared by Cathy Haebe (@kneadtomake) on Sep 15, 2014 at 3:38pm PDT
The watercolor details on this dreamy dessert by Knead to Make calls to mind a secret garden.
18 Floral Watercolor For a gorgeous summery @toriallen_events wedding at @thedeckatcirca tonight... smooth fondant, gold leaf and #sugarflowers üì∏: @sotiriasophie
A post shared by Cake Ink. (@cake_ink) on Dec 16, 2016 at 11:47pm PST
Not only does this three-tiered stunner by Cake Ink boast a floral watercolor middle, but it's also finished off with the most realistic-looking sugar flowers.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 19 Watercolor Sugar Flowers Hand painted watercolor cake with watercolor sugar flowers. Love the pastel combinations with the beautiful backdrop. Thank you @emilykatharinephoto for the amazing picture. To all that made this day possible: @tuftedvintagerentals #cdvcreations @carrollwoodflorist #tampaeventrentals #weddingwednesday #watercolor #sugarflowers #pastels #handsonsweets #weddingcakestampa #wedding #weddingcake #tampaweddingcakes #weddingcakeideas #weddingcakeinspiration #cakedesigner #luxuryweddingcakes #designercakes #bestcakes #engaged #bridetobe #tampaweddings #floridaweddings #realwedding #bestoftampa #tampabayweddings
A post shared by Chef Marie & Chef Carlos (@handsonsweets) on Aug 5, 2015 at 2:06pm PDT
Watercolor stems sprout hand-painted sugar flowers on this Hands On Sweets cake.
20 A post shared by Maggie Austin (@maggieaustincake) on Jun 2, 2015 at 6:52am PDT
Brushstrokes in the loveliest shade of blue give this Maggie Austin cake a heavenly feel.
21 Marble Watercolor Love this image in the latest issue of @bridesofnorthtx #marblecake #rufflecake #customcake #weddingcake #sugarbeesweets
A post shared by Sugar Bee Sweets (@sugarbeesweets) on Aug 19, 2016 at 6:24pm PDT
Sugar Bee Sweets successfully pulled of a marbled effect on the top two tiers of this magical watercolor wedding cake.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 22 Black and White Florals #sainteG #paintedcake #watercolorcake
A post shared by Sainte G. Cake Company (@sainte.g) on Jan 9, 2016 at 4:35pm PST
Once again, Sainte G. Cake Company proves to be a master at painting cakes.
23 Gold Painted Cake Sara+Florian= true love ‚ù§#oklahomabaker #normanbakery #bridesofok #paintedcakes #buttercream üì∏by @peytonrbyford
A post shared by Amy Cullifer (@amycakes7) on Feb 2, 2017 at 8:10pm PST
This Amy Cakes creation has everything: real and watercolor pink and red flowers, plus gold brushstrokes and polka dots as well.
24 Gold Lace and Flowers Gorgeous shot by @camillaanchisi for our ethereal enchanted forest shoot up on @fabyoubliss @jasminehoffman @hairbybrands @gardenpartyflowers @truvellebridal @theborrowedco #styledshoot #weddingcake #cake #handpainted #watercolour #Florals #paintedflowers #gold #airbrush #lace #embossed #tieredcake #ferns #peonies #weddingphotography #enchantedforest #naturallight #Stanleypark #thehollowtree
A post shared by Dalana (@cakeandgiraffe) on Nov 6, 2015 at 6:57pm PST
A lace-embossed top tier highlights the golden shades found in the focal point of this The Cake & The Giraffe wedding cake: a beautiful hand-painted peony scene.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 25 Stained Glass Watercolor A post shared by Maggie Austin (@maggieaustincake) on May 19, 2015 at 6:13am PDT
Maggie Austin achieves a stained-glass effect with this watercolor work of art.
26 Flowers in Bloom #flashbackfriday to our signature 'Flowers in Bloom' design üíï... We're currently producing some unique edible print designs to add to the online store so watch this space ‚úåüèºÔ∏è

The name of this signature design by Cake Ink is "Flowers in Bloom."
